Header <boost/test/unit_test.hpp>

Entry point into the Unit Test Framework.

This header should be the only header necessary to include to start using the framework 


BOOST_LIB_NAME
namespace boost {
  namespace unit_test {
    int unit_test_main(init_unit_test_func init_func, int argc, char * argv);
  }
}
